title: Only Sunshine
description: From the moment I heard Raegan’s voice, I’ve been intrigued. I’m not known for sentimentality. In fact, quite the opposite. I’m cold, professional, calculating.At least I was until I heard her voice. Until I saw her face. Until I began experiencing life in Raegan’s light. Now I’m obsessed, and I want to show her I can be more than a cold, unfeeling billionaire. But to get close to her, I have to hide who I am. When she discovers my true identity, will she run?
author: Lucy Darling
